author: hustla187
title: The Ace of Spades
review: Lego made a good decision releasing playing cards for a certain Lego theme. I like that a lot and it's one of those things that Lego needed to do. I like the minifig sketches on the jacks, queens, jokers, and kings which is also pretty cool. Now what Lego needs to do is make more of these for different themes. I really like where this is going and I hope Lego succeeds in doing so.
